items.title: Anker’s new 2K HD eufy C10 baby monitor with panoramic viewing, tilt, 4x zoom, more gets first savings to $100
items.summary:

This new monitor hit the scene recently with a $130 MSRP, which is getting the very first cash savings of $30 from both storefronts, setting the bar for future discounts throughout 2026.
